sentences.english: Finally, have a lot of fun.
Ask an elderly friend or family member to tell you a story about their childhood.
sentences.chinese: 请年长于你的朋友或家人告诉你关于他们的童年趣事。

sentences.english: Is there anything interesting in the pursuit of flower art?
sentences.chinese: 在追求花艺过程中有值得和我们分享的趣事吗？

sentences.english: Plan fun things to do when you’re not working.
sentences.chinese: 当你不工作时计划做些趣事。

sentences.english: Here are a few anecdotes told to me by friends and readers
sentences.chinese: 这里有三个朋友告诉我的遗闻趣事。

sentences.english: According to unofficial accounts, an amusing(funny) episode(incident) took place during this long and drawn out journey.
sentences.chinese: 据野史记载，在这漫长的旅途中还发生了一件趣事。

sentences.english: For his sense of humour, There are many anecdotes of Qianzhongshu.
sentences.chinese: 由于钱锺书的幽默风趣，有不少关于他的逸闻趣事。

sentences.english: After walking into barback , return Chang Yi to have your fish fun.
sentences.chinese: 走进军营后，还常忆起钧鱼趣事。

sentences.english: McManaman recalls a typical prank during Euro 96 in England.
sentences.chinese: 麦克马纳曼回忆在96年欧锦赛时发生的一件趣事。

sentences.english: They may share something philosophical, funny or silly.
sentences.chinese: 他们也许会跟你分享哲思，趣事或许傻事。

sentences.english: There's also a very amusing incident with a kebab.
sentences.chinese: 书里还有一个关于烤肉串的趣事。

sentences.english: Now let's hear from some folklore scholars to find out fun facts about Duanwu Festival.
sentences.chinese: 下面就来听听一些民俗学者找出的关于端午节的趣事。

sentences.english: According to unofficial accounts，an amusing episode took place during this long and drawn out journey.
sentences.chinese: 据野史记载，在这漫长的旅途中还发生了一件趣事。

sentences.english: The family members often get together on weekend to talk about the intresting things happened in the week.
sentences.chinese: 周末家人总中意聚在一起议论一周发生的趣事。

sentences.english: Genial face the wind blowing, we talked about life in an episode enjoying themselves.
sentences.chinese: 迎面吹来和煦的风，大家畅谈生活中趣事，不亦乐乎。

definition: what one has seen and heard/knowledge/one's experience
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
to amuse/to make sb laugh/to tease
bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
comedic material/(in reference to a person) laughingstock/butt of jokes
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
item of storytelling or performed dialogue (folk arts)/sketch
